block.p: Margaret Virginia Pugh, the daughter of Caroline Pugh and the Very Rev. Joel Pugh of Salisbury, England, and Hobe Sound, Fla., was married yesterday in Salisbury Cathedral to Jeffrey Lawrence O'Mara, the son of Marjorie and Frank O'Mara of Oneonta, N.Y. Canon David Slater, the vicar of the close of Salisbury Cathedral, officiated, and the Right Rev. C. F. Allison, the retired Episcopal bishop of South Carolina, took part in the ceremony.

Mrs. O'Mara, 29, graduated from Northwestern University and is now a candidate for a doctorate in American history at the University of Pennsylvania. From 1994 to 1996, she was a policy analyst on the White House staff of Vice President Al Gore. Her father, who retired as the dean of Trinity Episcopal Cathedral in Little Rock, Ark., is the chaplain of Christ Episcopal Chapel in Hobe Sound.

Margaret Virginia Pugh, the daughter of Caroline Pugh and the Very Rev. Joel Pugh of Salisbury, England, and Hobe Sound, Fla., was married yesterday in Salisbury Cathedral to Jeffrey Lawrence O'Mara, the son of Marjorie and Frank O'Mara of Oneonta, N.Y. Canon David Slater, the vicar of the close of Salisbury Cathedral, officiated, and the Right Rev. C. F. Allison, the retired Episcopal bishop of South Carolina, took part in the ceremony.

Mrs. O'Mara, 29, graduated from Northwestern University and is now a candidate for a doctorate in American history at the University of Pennsylvania. From 1994 to 1996, she was a policy analyst on the White House staff of Vice President Al Gore. Her father, who retired as the dean of Trinity Episcopal Cathedral in Little Rock, Ark., is the chaplain of Christ Episcopal Chapel in Hobe Sound.

Mr. O'Mara, 34, is the director of marketing communications at Slam Dunk Networks, a company in Redwood City, Calif., that provides rapid electronic delivery of business messages and transactions over the Internet. He graduated from the State University at Buffalo and later worked in Washington, where he met the bride and where he had been the press secretary to Representative Peter J. Visclosky, Democrat of Indiana.

The bridegroom's father is an associate professor of speech communications and the presiding officer of the faculty at the SUNY College at Oneonta. The bridegroom's mother is a senior buyer in Sidney, N.Y., for the Amphenol Corporation, a manufacturer of fiber optics and other electronics equipment.
